    • authorization

      public UserDTO authorization(String login, String password) throws ServiceException, ValidateException
      Gets login and password from action. Verify password. Convert entity to DTO. Returned user from role.
      Specified by:
      authorization in interface GeneralService
      Parameters:
      login - ,password - used to find and verify
      password - - to check if matches with user password
      Returns:
      UserDTO - DTO from role
      Throws:
      ServiceException - - may wrap DAOException or be thrown by another mistakes
      ValidateException - - occurs in case of non-verify password or not found user

    • downloadAllCoursesInPdf

      public ByteArrayOutputStream downloadAllCoursesInPdf(String locale, AppContext appContext) throws ServiceException
      Gets locale and AppContext from action and calls DAO to get relevant entities and count rows. Calls PdfCreator to create table with courses. Convert entity to DTO.
      Specified by:

      appContext - - used to call PdfCreator

    • recoveryPassword

      public void recoveryPassword(String email, AppContext appContext) throws ServiceException, ValidateException

      Specified by:
      recoveryPassword in interface GeneralService
      Parameters:

      ValidateException - - occurs in case of non-validation of data

    • addAvatar

      public UserDTO addAvatar(int userId, InputStream avatar) throws ServiceException, ValidateException
